Gravity: I would change the law of gravity to make it weaker. This would allow for easier movement and transportation of objects, making life more convenient.
Light: I would change the law of light to make it more flexible and adaptable. This would allow for better vision in low-light conditions and more opportunities for scientific research.
Time: I would change the law of time to allow for the ability to travel through time. This would allow for the ability to learn from past mistakes and make changes to the present and future.
Energy: I would change the law of energy to make it more accessible and renewable. This would allow for a more sustainable future and reduce our reliance on non-renewable energy sources.
Matter: I would change the law of matter to allow for the creation of new elements. This would allow for the development of new materials and technologies that would revolutionize various industries.
